job.title: NetSuite (ERP) Business Analyst - Remote
job.description: ltpgtbusiness analysts are responsible for defining scope eliciting business requirements and documenting in a concise manner for business and technologyenabled process improvement projects they quickly learn and understand business operational processes and the technology applications used to support them additionally they work closely with stakeholders to understand needs create and improve processes and propose solutions aligned with needsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtdutiesltstronggtltpgtltpgt experience implementing netsuite or similar erp crm systems through the full life cycle ltpgtltpgtstrong experience with data mapping conversion and systems integrations ltpgtltpgt evaluates business needs analyzes current processes assists in evaluating alternatives and recommends solutionsltpgtltpgt collaborates with business and information technology teams to ensure sufficient current and designed future state process documentation is captured allowing technology development teams to successfully code and implement technologyenabled projectsltpgtltpgt develops strong relationships with stakeholders and promotes company culture and service philosophyltpgtltpgt supports assessing prioritizing and executing strategic projectsltpgtltpgt elicits business requirements utilizing a variety of collaborative techniques including interviews work sessions storyboarding and prototypingltpgtltpgt facilitates requirements gathering sessions with business stakeholders creates process flows and develops various requirements and other artifactsltpgtltpgt measures and compiles reports on operational effectiveness and improvements introduced through technology or business process improvementsltpgtltpgt creates diagrams to include use cases activity charts and process flow diagramsltpgtltpgt evaluates and determines level of effort and time required for solution delivery to ensure completion in a timely mannerltpgtltpgt assists with the development of test strategies plans scenarios and test casesltpgtltpgt facilitates requirements reviews with business and information technology teamsltpgtltpgt identifies and assists in resolving issues questions and scoperequirement gaps quickly and effectively to enable delivery and support of applicationsltpgtltpgt other duties and special projects assignedltpgtltpgt utilizes standard templates to accurately and concisely write requirements specificationsltpgtltpgt conducts peer reviews of the business requirements to ensure that requirement specifications are correctly interpretedltpgtltpgt communicates changes enhancements and modifications of business requirements verbally or through written documentation to project managers sponsors and other stakeholders to ensure understanding of issues and solutionsltpgtltpgt participates in design review and qa testing of proposed solutions to ensure features and functions have been enabled and
